title: Rose Garden Condo~ Parking~ Elevator~ Laundry~ Balcony
posting_body: *Locked entry building with gated under building parking, includes intercom,  indoor lobby with mailboxes, elevator, and laundry room.
*Second floor condo is BRIGHT and fresh with laminate flooring in common space, carpet in bedrooms.
*Living room opens to balcony perfect for a bistro set for morning coffee or tea and faces other buildings so no scenes of cars zipping by.
*Carpet in both bedrooms that have ample closets.
*Kitchen is open plan with living room and includes electric stove, refrigerator, and dishwasher.
One gated under building parking (no extra spaces available).
Marquardt Property Management - 4164 MacArthur Blvd | Oakland, CA 94619 |BRE: # 02103144 | 00782318 | 01519096 | 02130573 | 02149997 | 02149956
